metadata.title: CVE-2023-21136 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In multiple functions of JobStore.java, there is a possible way to cause acrash on startup due to improper input validation. This could lead to localdenial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-246542285

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
